CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL( Points__c, 'Sign-Up' ), 0, IF(ISPICKVAL( Points__c, 'Sign-Up (HCM)' ), 1000, IF(ISPICKVAL( Points__c, 'Telephone Reference' ), 100, IF(ISPICKVAL( Points__c, 'Executive Quote' ), 250, IF(ISPICKVAL( Points__c, 'Onsite Reference' ), 500, IF(ISPICKVAL( Points__c, 'Case study and press release (written)' ), 550, IF(ISPICKVAL( Points__c, 'Case study and press release (video and written)' ), 850, IF(ISPICKVAL( Points__c, 'Event Speaker' ), 1000, IF(ISPICKVAL( Points__c, 'Points Spend' ), - Custom_Amount__c , IF(ISPICKVAL( Points__c, 'Host and speaker at an Access event on own premises' ), 2000,0))))))))))
CustomField.label: Activity Value
